div.p: This is the WildFHIR CE R4 Purge All operation. It provides a standardized mechanism to force a hard delete or purge of all FHIR resources and search meta data.
If successful, the operation may contain a string message with further information about the purge results.
If the operation was unsuccessful, then an OperationOutcome may be returned along with a BadRequest status Code (e.g. reference integrity issue, security issue, or insufficient privileges).
